title: yocto CMS DEMO
yocto: Yocto (symbol y) is a unit prefix in the metric system denoting a factor of 10−24 or 0.000000000000000000000001. It was adopted in 1991 by the General Conference on Weights and Measures. It comes from the Latin/Greek octo (οκτώ), meaning "eight", because it is equal to 1000−8. As of 2015, yocto is the smallest official SI prefix.
howto: To use content from yocto, you have to include "yocto.php".
admin: If you want to change your content, just go to admin.php, make your changes, and save them.
